block.p: BELOUS--Faye. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Faye Belous, beloved mother of Annora Gilman, a member of the UJA-Federation Long Island Steering Committee and chair of the South Shore Executive Committee. We extend our deepest sympathies to the Belous, Belousofsky, Gilman, and Reich families. Larry Zicklin, President Morris W. Offit Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay Exec. VP and CEO

BELOUS--Faye. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Faye Belous, beloved mother of Annora Gilman, a member of the UJA-Federation Long Island Steering Committee and chair of the South Shore Executive Committee. We extend our deepest sympathies to the Belous, Belousofsky, Gilman, and Reich families. Larry Zicklin, President Morris W. Offit Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay Exec. VP and CEO
